title: Renewable energy capacity - country ranking 2018
summary: This chart shows the Capacity of the Renewable energy Country in Renewable .

\n The Renewable energy Country is Brazil at 50.5 degrees , followed by China at 695.87 degrees , France at 50.5 degrees , U.S. at 245.25 degrees , Germany at 120.01 and the warmest of the displayed Country is India at 695.87 gigawatts .
gold: The leading countries for installed renewable energy in 2018 were China , the U.S. , and Brazil . China was leading in renewable energy installations with a capacity of around 696 gigawatts . The U.S. , in second place , had a capacity of around 245 gigawatts .
